Our Mental Health ChatBot is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. We collect information such as age, and mental health symptoms to provide personalized support and resources. However, we do not disclose or share this information with any third-party without the explicit consent of the user. We also use appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure.
Terms of Service
By using our Mental Health ChatBot, you agree to the following terms of service: The Mental Health ChatBot is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The Mental Health ChatBot is not responsible for any damages or losses arising from the use of the service.
